title: You have been disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again
body:
Started getting this error message about 7 hours ago.
I haven't been able to connect to a game since, every time I pick my champion. I go into the loading screen like usual but a black screen pops up, if I press enter the black screen disappears but either way, I cant proceed any further. Nothing loads and I get _**"You have been disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again"**_ error message.
I've flushed my DNS, restarted the client, PC and internet but I haven't been able to get it to work yet. I'm not good with how these sorts of things work so I have no other idea on how to fix this problem. If anyone has a solution, I'd really appreciate it if you could help me out.

replies.body:
I've found out that my net was having problems authenticating a connection, to fix this problem all I did was ring up my ISP (Internet Service Provider) and they guided me in helping fix my internet.
If anyone is still having the same issue as I did, give that a try and see if it works.
well can you tell us what they told you? those of us that have work all day don't have the time to ring up our ISP, sit on hold, and then get "guided" through "some fix"

Sorry, I've been out for my cousins 18th

Google IP address (if you don't know it)
Type your ip into google
You will be sent to your router settings
Log in
Unless changed user and pass would both be admin
Uninstall the server
Reboot router
Delete user and pass
Leave everything blank then save
Set router up as new device

Pretty much just a hard reset (factory reset) so the internet can re authenticate

I hope this works for you, best of luck!
Yep, cannot play at all atm!! very frustrating
i have the same problem, its been 2 days.
